## Datos

```{r}
tuesdata <- tidytuesdayR::tt_load(2025, 22)
gutenberg_authors <- tuesdata$gutenberg_authors
gutenberg_languages <- tuesdata$gutenberg_languages
gutenberg_metadata <- tuesdata$gutenberg_metadata
gutenberg_subjects <- tuesdata$gutenberg_subjects
```

## Procesamiento

Me interesa...

```{r}
top_lang <- inner_join(
  gutenberg_languages,
  gutenberg_authors,
  by = join_by(gutenberg_id == gutenberg_author_id)
) |>
  select(birthdate, language) |>
  drop_na() |>
  filter(between(birthdate, 1900, 2000)) |>
  count(language) |>
  slice_max(order_by = n, n = 6, with_ties = FALSE) |>
  mutate(language = fct_reorder(language, n)) |>
  pull(language)

top_lang_trad <- c(
  "Español",
  "Italiano",
  "Alemán",
  "Francés",
  "Finlandés",
  "Español"
)

top_lang_trad <- set_names(top_lang_trad, top_lang)

inner_join(
  gutenberg_languages,
  gutenberg_authors,
  by = join_by(gutenberg_id == gutenberg_author_id)
) |>
  select(language, birthdate) |>
  drop_na() |>
  filter(language %in% top_lang) |>
  count(language, birthdate) |>
  filter(between(birthdate, 1900, 2000)) |>
  mutate(language = factor(language, levels(top_lang))) |>
  ggplot(aes(birthdate, n, fill = language)) +
  geom_col(position = position_stack(), color = "white", linewidth = 1) +
  MetBrewer::scale_fill_met_d(
    name = "Juarez",
    breaks = top_lang,
    labels = top_lang_trad
  ) +
  guides(
    fill = guide_legend(reverse = TRUE)
  ) +
  theme_bw(base_size = 4) +
  theme(
    aspect.ratio = 1,
    legend.position = "inside",
    legend.position.inside = c(.9, .9),
    legend.justification.inside = c(1, 1)
  )
```

```{r}
inner_join(
  gutenberg_languages,
  gutenberg_authors,
  by = join_by(gutenberg_id == gutenberg_author_id)
) |>
  select(author, language) |>
  count(author, language, sort = TRUE) |>
  slice_max(order_by = n, n = 10, by = language, with_ties = FALSE) |>
  filter(language %in% top_lang) |>
  print(n = 100)
```
